front.head: Addressed to a BEECH TREE, on observing that some of its Leaves were tinged by the Smoke of a Fire that had been kindled under it.

lg.l: WHAT taints thy shade — or doth the year decay?
Yet soon again — thy tender leaf revives.
I too, in silence, to the grave go down;
But hope inspires — that still a sweeter spring
Where oft the Muse in plaintive notes
